data.message: did you guys change something?  I used to click in the upper right of my page (the drop down menu) to change my posts to either "only me" or "friends" in terms of who could see my posts.  That seems to have disappeared.  How do I do this without setting it right at the actual post.  Where did this function move to?

replies.message: Hi Angie. Thanks for reaching out. You'll find an audience selector tool most places you share status updates, photos and other things you post. To learn more, please visit: http://bit.ly/2kOYIHs. -Jon
will it keep that setting for every subsequent post I make or will I have to set it every time I post something?

Facebook it's easy to get phone number of anyone on the facebook. watch this video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g-atzu53oeM
